name_en: I Won't Let You Leave Yet
description_jp: 次に発動するSP特技で獲得するボルテージが自身のテクニックの28%増加
description_en: The Voltage gained from the next SP Skill increases by 28% of own Technique

effect.display: Gain 28% of Technique as extra Voltage on next SP skill
